Grocer Vollodos: Gather materials for research, killing monsters that live in the area. killing disrupters Corpses, sinks Corpses, shredders Corpses, Plague Zhukov, Infected root rot and decompose Disputes , You can get Rotten Bile , and killing Marsh persecutors Marsh Assassin Marsh overseers, the Collector Phone, Trusted Advisors Blood and Blood , - Rotten Blood . Collect on 20 pieces of each. This will be very helpful to our research. Can you? [Quest _490_DutyOfTheSurvivor 30137-6.htm |Say that you can handle this alone]
